name: nodejs-opensearch-frontend
description: Vite React frontend for product search learning project
headerComment: This package.json defines frontend dependencies and scripts for running the Product Search UI.

bottomExplanation.responsibility: Declares React + Axios + Vite tooling for the frontend app.
bottomExplanation.keySyntax: npm scripts like `dev` and `build` map to Vite commands.
bottomExplanation.commonMistakes: Wrong Vite plugin or missing React dependencies prevents dev server startup.
